mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from abs_base_info
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
,
from abs_base_info a right join abs_issue_info a1 on a1.base_id=a.id
order by ${orderByClause}
